column4: Can anyone help me with backing up to DVD on dapper using mondo ?
how do you wanna backup your dvd?
i am getting the error that growisofs can't be ran sudo
try it without sudo?
try what shatrat said
krich@eddie:~$ mondoarchive
right do sudo su first
Fatal error... Can't write DVDs as sudo because growisofs doesn't support this - see the growisofs manpage for details.
and when i run as sudo
even when you are sudo -i ?
lemme try that
same with sudi -i
i've searched google the forums and usenet with no luck, though i have seen where others have had the issue
dude you still havent told me what exaclty you are trying to do
like what kinda backup are you trying to make of your dvd
use mondoarchive to backup my /home/krich directory to a dvd ar /dev/dvdrw
i get an error saying growisofs cannot be run sudo
do you have a graphical environment?
gnome
why arent you just using gnomebaker?
il try from a clean terminal
i need to do a large backup to multi dvd, gnomebaker doesn suppot that
oh
